formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Instance|Reservation Id:
formElement.documentation: If this is an instance id, terminate that one instance. If this is a reservation id, terminate all instances in the reservation.

formElement.label: List of Resources:
formElement.documentation: List of Commander resources to delete. Separate a list of resources with semi-colons.
